document.body:
Burger King Original Zesty Sauce
Posted in Salad
Burger King Original Zesty Sauce SERVES 6
I love Burger King's Zesty dipping sauce, offered with their onion rings... which used to be somewhat palatable (no further comments about the rapidly diminishing quality and portions of today's fast food restaurant chains...). On each BK visit, I would routinely purchase additional Zesty sauces so I could take a good supply home with me... until the simple solution came when I opened my last remaining packet..."I can make this myself at home!"... And I did...
Ingredients for Burger King Original Zesty Sauce:
BASIC RECIPE 1/2 cup real mayonnaise 2 tablespoons tomato ketchup 2 tablespoons creamed horseradish 2 teaspoons prepared yellow mustard 2 teaspoons ranch dressing 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper SERVE WITH onion rings, burgers, sandwiches, crab cakes, batter-fried fish and prawns FOR SEAFOOD ADD fresh lemon juice, grated fresh lemon zest, minced fresh onion, fresh minced dill or tarragon, chopped sweet pickle FOR A SANDWICH SPREAD (choose one or two) chopped fresh dill, chopped sweet pickle, minced green onion, chopped hard-boiled egg, minced fresh red pepper
Preparation of Burger King Original Zesty Sauce:
COMBINE all ingredients in a small bowl using a wire whisk. SERVE and enjoy! STORE in a resealable container in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
Nutrition of Burger King Original Zesty Sauce: Nutrition Facts
Serving Size 1 (61g)
Recipe makes 6 servings
